sn37.15:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anuruddho bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn37.15:1.2: “idhaham, bhante, matugamam passami dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjantam.
sn37.15:1.3: Katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati”ti?
sn37.15:2.1: “Pancahi kho, anuruddha, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
sn37.15:2.3: Saddho ca hoti, hirima ca hoti, ottappi ca hoti, akkodhano ca hoti, pannava ca hoti—
sn37.15:2.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pancahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati”ti.
